alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 21 at 7:16PM MDT until June 23 at 12:20AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek At Colorado Springs affecting El Paso County. Fountain Creek Near Fountain affecting El Paso County. Fountain Creek Near Pinon affecting Pueblo County. .Heavy rainfall will cause Fountain Creek to rise above flood stage later tonight through tomorrow morning. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain, Pinon, Pueblo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Fountain. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Moderate agricultural flooding and bank erosion occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 13.9 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.1 feet on 04/30/1999. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Fountain Creek Fountain 12.0 8.0 Wed 6 pm MDT 7.7 MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 715 AM MDT.
